Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, welcome home. Did you work
hard today? I've been waiting for
you to get home.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm glad you're home! You
are always working so hard! I missed
you a lot.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My darling <MYNAME>, welcome home!
You're right on time. I was just about
to go look for you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dearest <MYNAME>, welcome home! You
put a lot of effort into your work. 
I was eager to have you by my side.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, welcome. It's about time. I
was getting tired of waiting for you!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, my love, welcome back! I was
starting to worry about you! Did you
have a nice day?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, honey, welcome back! How was 
work today? I was lonely without you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, welcome home. You're so late.
I waited so long.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome back, <MYNAME>... I was starting
to... worry.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, welcome home. I appreciate
your hard work. I'm happy to have you
back home.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, sweetie, welcome back! I'm
glad you're finally home.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME> dear, what took you so long?
It's about time you got home.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is <CHILD_NAME>'s birthday. We
ought to celebrate.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You didn't forget about <CHILD_NAME>'s
birthday, did you? Let's have a party!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our little <CHILD_NAME> is growing up
so fast. Let's do something nice.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is a special day for young <CHILD_NAME>. 
We should all celebrate together.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's <CHILD_NAME>'s birthday today, isn't it?
Let's make it a day to remember!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today our <CHILD_NAME> celebrates one more 
year! Let's have a party worthy of 
royalty!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is little <CHILD_NAME>'s birthday!
Let's have a party the whole town will
talk about!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> is completing one more year 
today! I created a lot of new magic
tricks especially for the party!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>... birthday. Shall we...
celebrate?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A new year in <CHILD_NAME>'s life starts 
today! Celebrating is a must!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I baked <CHILD_NAME> a fabulous birthday 
cake! I can't wait to eat it! I mean...
together, of course!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey it's <CHILD_NAME>'s birthday isn't
it? We probably ought to do something.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>. When you
get bigger I'll treat you to a real
meal.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy B-day, little <CHILD_NAME>! When
you get bigger we'll have a nice
cake for you!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Many cheers to you, <CHILD_NAME>! You make our
lives richer every day. Here's to your
continued health and happiness.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, little <CHILD_NAME>. May
you always be healthy. We're all
watching over you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, happy birthday! Once you're big
enough we can stuff ourselves with cake!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>! You're the 
prince today! We wish you a long, noble
life!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>! I can't
wait until you're old enough to 
celebrate with us!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, little <CHILD_NAME>!
When you get bigger, get your parents
to buy you lots of presents.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>... I hope you...
stay healthy. We'll be... always by
your side.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, dear <CHILD_NAME>! You're
our town's own precious stone! I wish
you a lot of happiness!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, sweet little <CHILD_NAME>! 
When you get bigger you'll be able to
taste my delicious cakes!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>. Once you get
bigger you can help me out on some
of my experiments. It'll be a blast!

Happy birthday, dear <CHILD_NAME>! I wish you
a lot of happiness!
